featuredItemsData.title: How to explain ADHD to kids

description.text: Edward Hallowell, MD, EdD, Psychiatrist, ADHD Specialist, and Author, shares advice for parents on the best way to tell their child that they have ADD or ADHD and how to explain it in a way that the child will understand.

featuredItemsData.title: Behavioral Treatments for Kids With ADHD

description.text: There are two kinds of behavioral treatments that can help kids with ADHD (attention-deficit hyperactivity disorder). While they donâ€™t change the symptoms of ADHD, they do teach kids how to manage them. Some kids who get behavioral treatment might need to take medication as well. For others, behavioral treatment is enough to keep their ADHD symptoms under control.

featuredItemsData.title: Whykids with ADHD need different parenting strategies

description.text: We discuss 3 core difficulties related to ADHD that make it harder for children to follow instructions and stay motivated. We then identify 3 changes caregivers can make to their parenting approach to help their child with ADHD stay engaged and set them up for success.

featuredItemsData.title: How to help your child (and others) understand ADHD

description.text: Siope Kinikini M.A. discusses the approach recommended for talking to children and teens about ADHD and how to communicate about it with family members who may not understand it.

description.text: Having fun isn't just enjoyable, it's essential for your health and happiness.Watch this video to learn how to weave playfulness into your every day life.

description.text: Do you have enough fun in life? Catherine Price, author of "The Power of Fun," explains the three components of true fun and how to tap into this powerful, everyday source of joy.

description.text: Play is not just for kids. Learn how play can improve your relationships, creativity, and productivity.

data.title: The power of play: A path to healding anxiety, depression, and PTSD

description.text: Embracing playfulness and silliness is not only a way to heal a fried nervous system. Let's dive into why play matters and how it can be a vital part of your mental health journey.

description.text: Learn mindful eating to help resolve mindless and emotional eating and senseless yo-yo dieting to live the vibrant life you crave.
